member.name: PRJ_EXTENDED_INFO
member.summary: A provider uses PRJ_EXTENDED_INFO to provide extended information about a file when calling or .

member.name: PRJ_EXTENDED_INFO.InfoType
member.summary: A value describing what kind of extended information this structure contains.

member.name: PRJ_EXTENDED_INFO.NextInfoOffset
member.summary: Offset in bytes from the beginning of this structure to the next PRJ_EXTENDED_INFO structure. If this is the last structure in the buffer this value must be 0.

member.name: PRJ_EXTENDED_INFO.DUMMYUNIONNAME.Symlink
member.summary: The fields in this struct are used if InfoType is PRJ_EXT_INFO_TYPE_SYMLINK.

member.name: PRJ_EXTENDED_INFO.DUMMYUNIONNAME.Symlink.TargetName
member.summary: Specifies the name of the target of a symbolic link.
